text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Some kindly advice: only the Coronavirus team needs to brief the American people. You, our President, have better things to do than to give these quack reporters any more ammo to hurt you. They will take any word, any look, body movement & spin it against you. Bastards they are.
